title: Pfizer announces successful trial of cancer vaccine
content: Pfizer's mRNA-based cancer vaccine shows promising results in early-stage human trials.

title: UN approves global climate finance fund
content: The United Nations has approved a multi-billion dollar climate fund to help developing nations.
